title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Israel hits more Iranian military targets, Iran retaliates on fourth day of conflict
items.description: Trump said Sunday he remained optimistic about Israel and Iran reaching a deal, but added "sometimes they have to fight it out."

items.title: Emergency alerts go out in Spanish and English, but what happens if you speak another language?
items.description: The FCC has delayed implementing its multilingual emergency alerts system — making non-English speakers vulnerable during climate disasters.

items.title: Man suspected of shooting Minnesota lawmakers arrested after huge manhunt

items.description: The recovery of the recorder is a key step in uncovering what caused last week's deadly plane crash.

items.title: Israel accuses Iran of targeting civilians, killing 8 in missile strikes
items.description: Israel says Iran is targeting civilians, killing 8 people, as the Israeli military hammers Iranian launch sites and says it controls Tehran's skies.

items.title: The AI revolution is likely to drive up your electricity bill. Here's why.
items.description: Utilities are racing to build data centers to meet surging demand for AI and other tech services. Ratepayers will pick up the tab, experts say.

items.title: Australian police officer shot dead at rural property
items.description: The officer was undertaking "routine duties" when he was fired at by "a member of the public", police say.

items.description: Hostility towards tourists in Spain grows as locals complain of being forced out of their own cities.
